thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone, Ranbir Kapoor hug each other in between shots: Watch behind the scenes of ‘Tamasha’ - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Deepika Padukone, Ranbir Kapoor hug each other in between shots: Watch behind the scenes of ‘Tamasha’
text: In a series of behind-the-scenes videos that the official Twitter handle of Deepika Padukone and Ranbir Kapoor's upcoming movie 'Tamasha' has posted, the lead pair of the movie is seen prepping up for their song shoots, and getting all emotional and hugging each other after wrapping up a song. »
